summary: This document is a statement in support of the registration of Hyperion Air, LLC, detailing its eligibility as a U.S. citizen-owned entity for aircraft registration. It lists Jeffrey E. Epstein as the sole member and Lawrence Visoski as the manager, confirming their citizenship and the LLC's compliance with federal regulations.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the sole member of Hyperion Air, LLC, confirming his U.S. citizenship.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Lawrence Visoski is listed as the manager of Hyperion Air, LLC, and is also confirmed to be a U.S. citizen.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the sole member of the LLC, while Lawrence Visoski serves as the manager.

keyFacts: Hyperion Air, LLC is organized in the United States Virgin Islands and is eligible to register aircraft.
The effective date of the LLC is October 8, 2012.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the sole member of Hyperion Air, LLC and is a U.S. citizen.
Lawrence Visoski is the manager of Hyperion Air, LLC and is also a U.S. citizen.
The document certifies compliance with federal regulations regarding LLC citizenship for aircraft registration.
